title: Circus Baby

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every night, trap a player in the scooping room.
- 3 times per game you may choose to scoop out the insides of your target, granting you their abilities, and killing your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may anonymously speak with your target anonymously.
- You grant your target Overprotective defense that night.
- You roleblock your target.
- If you scoop a good player, you permanently lose the ability to scoop another player.
- You can only target the child once per game, and you cannot scoop them.
- Abilities you scoop are subject to rule 17.
- All actions taken on your target will fail.

desc:
Post 4415
*Why does this one... ...act so weird?*
